'''Rainbow at Summit''' is a [[soundtrack]] from the album ''[[Jade Moon Upon a Sea of Clouds]]''.

This soundtrack is featured as a tune contained within [[Radiant Spincrystal 41]].

* This soundtrack shares the same theme with [[A Casual Visit]], [[A Serendipitous Encounter]], [[Above the Sea of Clouds]], [[Adeptus' Retirement]], [[Freedom of Crane]], and [[Rays of Sunlight]].
